page.title: 13Government
page.content: Seven councillors are elected every 4 years to serve as the Parish Council,& they elect a chairman.Only those who live or work full-time in the parish may serve.The P.C.meets every 6 or 7 weeks,and holds an A.G.M.The responsibilities of the P.C. include representing the people of the village in dealings with other people or public bodies,comments on planning applications, land ownership for recreational purposes,ensuring roads,verges and greens are maintained, protecting and planting trees,maintaining public rights of way, the cemetery & burial records. To carry out much of its business, the P.C. has an officer ,Clerk to the Parish Council.
